{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-2680 |revision=A1 |asin= |series=AC1750 |fcc_date=02/27/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |availability=new |type=access point |fcc_id=KA2AP2680A1 |ic_id=4216A-AP2680A1 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, FU72424S, 1724, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6SB-25 |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, FU72424S, 1724, CHINA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NE650468, E065000; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN/BT FEM;Skyworks;SKY85303-11;SKY11, 85303, 708EA;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, ALNF;3; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''450''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless AC1750 Wave 2 Dual-Band PoE Access Point}} Only three of the QCA9984's tx/rx chains are actually :implemented so this is 3x3:3 for 5GHz. :{{see also|D-Link DIR-2680}}
